name: Release v0.2.1
body:
## What Has Changed

## What's Changed
* chore: sync Bazel version with BCR presubmit by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/45


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/compare/v0.2.0...v0.2.1

## Bazel Module Snippet

```python
bazel_dep(name = "swift_gazelle_plugin", version = "0.2.1")
```

name: Release v0.2.0
body:
## What Has Changed

## What's Changed
* fix(deps): update golang.org/x/exp digest to 054e65f by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/18
* chore(deps): update dependency apple/swift-log to from: "1.6.3" by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/19
* chore(deps): update dependency apple/swift-nio to v2.81.0 by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/22
* chore: update README.md for v0.1.0 by @cgrindel-app-token-generator in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/25
* chore(deps): update dependency apple_support to v1.19.0 by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/26
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v8.1.1 by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/27
* chore(deps): update dependency cgrindel_bazel_starlib to v0.25.2 by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/28
* chore(deps): update dependency gazelle to v0.42.0 by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/29
* chore(deps): update dependency grpc/grpc-swift to v1.24.2 by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/30
* chore(deps): update dependency protobuf to v29.3 by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/31
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_apple to v3.20.1 by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/32
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_swift to v2.7.0 by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/33
* fix(deps): update module github.com/bazelbuild/bazel-gazelle to v0.42.0 by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/35
* chore(deps): update dependency apple/swift-protobuf to v1.29.0 by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/23
* fix(deps): update module github.com/deckarep/golang-set/v2 to v2.8.0 by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/36
* fix(deps): update module golang.org/x/text to v0.23.0 by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/37
* chore: remove swift.bzl umbrella loads by @jflan-dd in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/15
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_swift_package_manager to v0.47.2 by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/34
* chore(deps): update dependency grpc/grpc-swift to v2 by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/38
* chore(deps): update dependency protobuf to v30 by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/39
* chore(deps): update dependency grpc/grpc-swift to v2.1.1 by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/40
* chore(deps): update dependency grpc/grpc-swift to v2.1.2 by @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/41
* Make compilers a mergeable attr, so it can be updated when the compiler directives change by @jboulter11 in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/43

## New Contributors
* @cgrindel-self-hosted-renovate made their first contribution in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/18
* @cgrindel-app-token-generator made their first contribution in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/25
* @jflan-dd made their first contribution in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/15
* @jboulter11 made their first contribution in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/43

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

## Bazel Module Snippet

```python
bazel_dep(name = "swift_gazelle_plugin", version = "0.2.0")
```

name: Release v0.1.0
body:
## What Has Changed

## What's Changed
* chore: migrate files from `rules_swift_package_manager` and set up CI by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/1
* feat: Use GRPC from SPM by @AttilaTheFun in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/7
* docs: first pass for README by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/5
* chore: generate CI workflow by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/10
* chore: introduce release process by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/12
* feat: Allow for multiple proto compilers by @AttilaTheFun in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/14
* chore: add Renovate config files by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/17
* chore: add support for `publish-to-bcr` by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/21
* chore: upgrade cgrindel_bazel_starlib to 0.25.2 by @cgrindel in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/24

## New Contributors
* @cgrindel made their first contribution in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/1
* @AttilaTheFun made their first contribution in https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/pull/7

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cgrindel/swift_gazelle_plugin/commits/v0.1.0

## Bazel Module Snippet

```python
bazel_dep(name = "swift_gazelle_plugin", version = "0.1.0")
```
